Posts.Content: Hi Lynne I had Lumpectomy on 11th Oct before the surgery I had scan and radioactive injection then ct scan they said it was so that the surgeon knew where to operate also had a blue dye injected- breast is still blue said it would take a few months to fade. Starting Chemo next weds so feeling a bit anxious at the moment let me know if you need to know anything else take care Julie x
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy

Posts.Content: Hi Wendy I had my lumpectomy and snb on 11th October i had to wait two weeks for the results which were clear but grade 3 so then had to wait for Chemo which started on 7th December. I found that the waiting is the worst part (apart from the side effects - i must be one of the 20%).Â  I was told that the delay for treatment would not have any effect . Hope all goes well for you Julie x
Posts.Title: Starting Chemo Late
